allPosts.title: UGC Monetization Platform - $760K+ Revenue Impact
allPosts.excerpt: Developed and launched a comprehensive User-Generated Content monetization platform that transformed community engagement into sustainable revenue streams, achieving $760K+ in direct revenue impact while scaling to serve 30M+ monthly users across Cond√© Nast media brands.

allPosts.title: Subscription Growth Engine - 2.5x Revenue Increase
allPosts.excerpt: Built and optimized a data-driven subscription growth platform that achieved 2.5x subscription revenue increase through personalized onboarding experiences, predictive analytics, and strategic retention initiatives across premium media properties.

allPosts.title: AI-Powered Content Moderation at Scale
allPosts.excerpt: Designed and implemented an AI-powered content moderation system that automated 85% of editorial review processes while maintaining 99.2% accuracy in brand safety compliance across 30M+ monthly users and thousands of daily content submissions.
